task.title: Make an SWS.online appointment
task.shortdesc: Learn how to successfully make an SWS.online appointment.

taskbody.prereq:
To make an SWS.online appointment, you will need:
a UMN email account
DUO authentication
your class and work calendar for scheduling the online chat
a digital version of your document
your specific questions and concerns for the consultant to focus on

context.p: SWS.online appointments can only be made through mySWS.com.

step.cmd: From the menu at the top of the page, select Make an SWS.online Appointment.
Select a consultation time and date from the list of available consultation slots.
Enter the name of the course you are writing for in the available box, or select Not For Credit.
Indicate research consent in the provided box.
Select Create Visit to finalize your appointment.

taskbody.postreq: Upload your document 3.5 to 1.5 hours before your consultation, then enter the consultation at the appointment time.
